tests.name: BOOLEAN - key
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K BOOLEAN KEY, V INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: BOOLEAN - value - anonymous - deserialize
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V BOOLEAN) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V BOOLEAN) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V ARRAY<DOUBLE>) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V ARRAY<DOUBLE>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');

tests.name: MAP - key - C*
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K MAP<INT, DOUBLE> KEY, foo INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', format='JSON');

expectedException.message: Map keys, including types that contain maps, are not supported as they may lead to unexpected behavior due to inconsistent serialization. Key column name: `K`. Column type: MAP<INTEGER, DOUBLE>. See https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql/issues/6621 for more.

tests.name: nested MAP type - key - C*
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K ARRAY<MAP<INT, DOUBLE>> KEY, foo INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', format='JSON');

expectedException.message: Map keys, including types that contain maps, are not supported as they may lead to unexpected behavior due to inconsistent serialization. Key column name: `K`. Column type: ARRAY<MAP<INTEGER, DOUBLE>>. See https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql/issues/6621 for more.

tests.name: MAP - key - C*AS
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (k STRING KEY, v STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT PARTITION BY MAP(k:=v);

expectedException.message: Map keys, including types that contain maps, are not supported as they may lead to unexpected behavior due to inconsistent serialization. Key column name: `KSQL_COL_0`. Column type: MAP<STRING, STRING>. See https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql/issues/6621 for more.

tests.name: nested MAP type - key - C*AS
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (k STRING KEY, v STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT PARTITION BY STRUCT(f := MAP(k:=v));

expectedException.message: Map keys, including types that contain maps, are not supported as they may lead to unexpected behavior due to inconsistent serialization. Key column name: `KSQL_COL_0`. Column type: STRUCT<`F` MAP<STRING, STRING>>. See https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql/issues/6621 for more.

tests.name: MAP - value - anonymous - deserialize
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V MAP<STRING, DOUBLE>) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false, kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V MAP<STRING, DOUBLE>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo STRUCT<F0 INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: serialize nested struct - value
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo STRUCT<F0 INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=true) AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;

tests.name: map with non-string keys - C*
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (foo MAP<INT, DOUBLE>) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');

expectedException.message: JSON only supports MAP types with STRING keys

tests.name: map with non-string keys - C*AS
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (k INT, v DOUBLE) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT MAP(k:=v) FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: JSON only supports MAP types with STRING keys

tests.name: keyless JSON
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (V INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;
